General.Name: Mengtian Home Group Inc.
General.Description: Mengtian Home Group Inc. designs, develops, produces, and sells customized wooden furniture in China. The company's products include wooden doors, windows, wall panels, and cabinets. It also offers home furnishing and furniture products. The company offers its products under Mengtian brand name. Mengtian Home Group Inc. was founded in 2003 and is based in Jiaxing, China.
